UserPrefs.WelcomeMessage: welcome to the UserPreferator, where all your UserPrefs can be set.
UserPrefs.ExitMessage: Enter ‘x’ at any time to exit the program.

ChangePreferences.Prompt: Enter the number [1,2,3,4] to change a preference:
ChangePreferences.CurrentPreference: Language Preference Set : Current Language English

UserPrefs.ExitMessagePirate: Avast Ye UserPreferator, it be the coffer fer all yer UserPrefs sett’n needs.
